639.title: Terms and privacy policy pages are organized and formatted well.

tosdr.case: The terms for this service are easy to read
tosdr.tldr: Index at the top with links to #anchors down the page. The pages are long, but the index helps alleviate that a lot.

716.quoteText: You can cancel your Netflix membership at any time, and you will continue to have access to the Netflix service through the end of your billing period.
716.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time
tosdr.tldr: You may cancel your Netflix membership at any time. WE DO NOT PROVIDE REFUNDS OR CREDITS FOR ANY PARTIAL-MONTH MEMBERSHIP PERIODS OR UNWATCHED MOVIES OR TV SHOWS.

757.quoteText: You can request access to your personal information, or correct or update out-of-date or inaccurate personal information we hold about you.
757.title: Users can request access and deletion of personal info.

tosdr.case: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
tosdr.tldr: With respect to your personal information, you can request access and that we correct or delete this personal information by emailing your request to pri...@netflix.com.

1051.quoteText: We disclose your information for certain purposes and to third parties, as described below
1051.title: Netflix reserve the right to disclose personal info, no notification.

tosdr.case: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
tosdr.tldr: Netflix also reserves the right to disclose personal information if we reasonably believe that access, use, preservation or disclosure of such information is reasonably necessary to (a) satisfy any applicable law, regulation, legal process, or enforceable governmental request, (b) enforce applicable terms of use, including investigation of potential violations thereof, (c) detect, prevent, or otherwise address illegal or suspected illegal activities, security or technical issues, or (d) protect against harm to the rights, property or safety of Netflix, its users or the public as required or permitted by law. In connection with any reorganization, restructuring, merger or sale, or other transferring of assets we reserve the right to transfer information, including personal information, provided that the receiving party agrees to respect your personal information in a manner that is consistent with our privacy policy.

1348.quoteText: In connection with any reorganization, restructuring, merger or sale, or other transfer of assets, we will transfer information, including personal information, provided that the receiving party agrees to respect your personal information in a manner that is consistent with our Privacy Statement.
1348.title: Promises will be kept after a merger or acquisition

tosdr.case: Promises will be kept after a merger or acquisition
tosdr.tldr: Your information can be transferred to a new company, but only if it complies with Netflix's Privacy Policy.

10682.quoteText: use any robot, spider, scraper or other automated means to access the Netflix service.
10682.title: Spidering or crawling is not allowed

tosdr.case: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed

11354.quoteText: The Netflix service may be provided through and/or utilize features (such as voice controls) operated by third party platforms, or contain links to sites operated by third parties whose policies regarding the handling of information may differ from ours.
11354.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

11355.quoteText: We and our Service Providers use cookies and other technologies (such as web beacons)
11355.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

11356.quoteText: These Terms of Use shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Netherlands.
11356.title: The court of law governing the terms is in location Netherlands

tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in location X

12995.quoteText:
If you use the Netflix app on a mobile device, tablet, or streaming media device, we may collect a resettable device identifier from your device.
Resettable device identifiers (also known as advertising identifiers) are similar to cookies and are found on many mobile devices and tablets (for example, the "Identifier for Advertisers" (or IDFA) on Apple iOS devices and the "Google Advertising ID" on Android devices), and certain streaming media devices.
12995.title: App required for this service requires broad device permissions

tosdr.case: App required for this service requires broad device permissions

12996.quoteText:
We use these types of technologies for various reasons, like making it easy to access our services by remembering you when you return.
to provide, analyze, understand and enhance the use of our services.
to enforce our terms, prevent fraud.
to improve site performance, monitor visitor traffic and actions on our site.
and to deliver and tailor our marketing or advertising, and to understand interactions with our emails, marketing, and online ads on third party sites.
12996.title: This service uses your personal information for many different purposes

tosdr.case: Your personal information is used for many different purposes

12997.quoteText: These cookies are strictly necessary to provide our website or online service.
12997.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

12998.quoteText: Advertising cookies and resettable device identifiers: These cookies and resettable device identifiers use information about your use of this and other websites and apps, your response to ads and emails, and to deliver ads that are more relevant to you and for analytics and optimization purposes. These types of ads are called "interest-based advertising." The advertising cookies associated with our service belong to our Service Providers.
12998.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

tosdr.case: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

12999.quoteText: For example, we and our Service Providers may use these cookies to authenticate and identify our members when they use our websites and applications so we can provide our service to them.
12999.title: This service requires first-party cookies

tosdr.case: First-party cookies are used

13000.quoteText: service providers that help us determine a location based on your IP address in order to customize our service and for other uses consistent with this Privacy Statement.
13000.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

tosdr.case: This service may collect, use, and share location data

13001.quoteText: IP address (which may tell us your general location)
13001.title: This service collects your IP address, which can be used to view your approximate location

tosdr.case: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
tosdr.tldr: "We collect information about you and your use of our service,[...] This information includes: [...] IP address (which may tell us your general location),"

13002.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

tosdr.case: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
tosdr.tldr: "We collect information about you and your use of our service, [...]This information includes: [...] referring source (for example, referral URLs),"

13003.quoteText:
We collect information from other companies with whom you have a relationship (“Partners”).
These Partners might include (depending on what services you use): your TV or internet service provider, or other streaming media device providers who make our service available on their device.
13003.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties

tosdr.case: Information is gathered about you through third parties

13004.quoteText: We use information to provide, analyze, administer, enhance and personalize our services and marketing efforts,
13004.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

tosdr.case: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

13005.quoteText: In connection with our use of these technologies, some of the websites and apps where we advertise, as well as advertising technology companies that we use to purchase, deliver, optimize, and/or measure our advertisements (collectively “Advertising Partners”), may receive limited information from us as part of our campaign targeting, measurement, and optimization (e.g., steps completed in sign-up and site visit or app open/install information).
13005.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

tosdr.case: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising

13006.quoteText: Promotional offers: We may offer joint promotions or programs that, in order for your participation, will require us to share your information with third parties. In fulfilling these types of promotions, we may share your name and other information in connection with fulfilling the incentive.
13006.title: This service can share your personal information to third parties

tosdr.case: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation

13007.quoteText: Netflix and its Service Providers may disclose and otherwise use your personal and other information where we or they reasonably believe such disclosure is needed to (a) satisfy any applicable law, regulation, legal process, or governmental request,
13007.title: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable

tosdr.case: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable

13008.quoteText: If any provision or provisions of these Terms of Use shall be held to be invalid, illegal, or unenforceable, the validity, legality and enforceability of the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.
13008.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

tosdr.case: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

13009.quoteText:
Changes to Terms of Use.
Netflix may, from time to time, change these Terms of Use.
We will notify you at least 30 days before such changes apply to you.
13009.title: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, users are notified at least 30 days in advance

tosdr.case: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, you are notified at least 30 days in advance

13626.quoteText: If you have general questions about your account or how to contact customer service for assistance, please visit our online help center at help.netflix.com.
13626.title: The service provides a free help desk

tosdr.case: A free help desk is provided

13627.quoteText:
For questions specifically about this Privacy Statement, or our use of your personal information, cookies or similar technologies, please contact our Data Protection Officer/Privacy Office by email at privacy@netflix.com.

The data controller of your personal information is Netflix International B.V. Please note that if you contact us to assist you, for your safety and ours we may need to authenticate your identity before fulfilling your request.
13627.title: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data

tosdr.case: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data

13628.quoteText: We receive and store information about you such as:
13628.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

tosdr.case: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect

13629.title: The service collects many different types of personal data

tosdr.case: Many different types of personal data are collected
tosdr.tldr:
"[...]Information you provide to us: We collect information you provide to us which includes: your name, email address, address or postal code, payment method(s), and telephone number.[...]
information when you choose to provide ratings, taste preferences, account settings (including preferences set in the "Account" section of our website), or otherwise provide information to us through our service or elsewhere.
Information we collect automatically[...]"

13630.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication

tosdr.case: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
tosdr.tldr: Full quote: "Information you provide to us: We collect information you provide to us which includes: your name, email address, address or postal code, payment method(s), and telephone number. In certain countries, we collect a government identification number for purposes such as billing and tax compliance. We collect this information in a number of ways, including when you enter it while using our service, interact with our customer service, or participate in surveys or marketing promotions."

13631.quoteText: or participate in surveys or marketing promotions.
13631.title: The service may collect extra data about you through promotions

tosdr.case: Extra data may be collected about you through promotions
tosdr.tldr: Full quote: "Information you provide to us: We collect information you provide to us which includes: your name, email address, address or postal code, payment method(s), and telephone number. In certain countries, we collect a government identification number for purposes such as billing and tax compliance. We collect this information in a number of ways, including when you enter it while using our service, interact with our customer service, or participate in surveys or marketing promotions."

13632.quoteText: We collect this information in a number of ways, including
13632.title: The service provides information about how they collect personal data

tosdr.case: Information is provided about how they collect personal data

13633.quoteText: online and offline data providers, from which we obtain aggregated demographic, interest based and online advertising related data.
13633.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

tosdr.case: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

13634.quoteText: publicly-available sources such as publicly available posts on social media platforms and information available through public databases associating IP addresses with internet service providers (ISPs).
13634.title: This service tracks you on social media and public databases.

tosdr.case: This service tracks you on other websites
tosdr.tldr: "These sources vary over time, but could include: [...] publicly-available sources such as publicly available posts on social media platforms and information available through public databases associating IP addresses with internet service providers (ISPs)."

13635.quoteText:
For example, we use such information to:

  • determine your general geographic location, provide localized content, provide you with customized and personalized viewing recommendations for movies and TV shows we think will be of interest to you,
13635.title: The service uses your personal data for advertising

tosdr.case: Your personal data is used for advertising

13636.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data

tosdr.case: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

13637.quoteText: details of your interactions with our customer service, such as the date, time and reason for contacting us, transcripts of any chat conversations, and if you call us, your phone number and call recordings.
13637.title: Your biometric data is collected

tosdr.case: Your biometric data is collected

13638.quoteText:
If you no longer want to receive certain communications from us via email or text message, simply access the "Communications Settings" option in the "Account" section of our website and uncheck those items to unsubscribe.
Alternatively, click the "unsubscribe" link in the email or reply STOP (or as otherwise instructed) to the text message.
Please note that you cannot unsubscribe from service-related correspondence from us, such as messages relating to your account transactions.
13638.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

tosdr.case: You can opt out of promotional communications

13639.quoteText:
social plugins and similar technologies allow you to share information.

Social plugins and social applications are operated by the social networks themselves, and are subject to their terms of use and privacy policies.
13639.title: The service uses social media cookies/pixels

tosdr.case: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels

13640.quoteText: At this time, we do not respond to web browser "do not track" signals.
13640.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.

13641.quoteText: If you are the account owner, to download a copy of your personal information go to: www.netflix.com/account/getmyinfo (you must be signed in to access the "Account" section), and follow the instructions.
13641.title: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data

tosdr.case: You can retrieve an archive of your data

13642.quoteText:
You can object to processing of your personal information, ask us to restrict processing of your personal information or request portability of your personal information.
if we have collected and process your personal information with your consent, then you can withdraw your consent at any time.
withdrawing your consent will not affect the lawfulness of any processing we conducted prior to your withdrawal, nor will it affect processing of your personal information conducted in reliance on lawful processing grounds other than consent.
you have the right to complain to a data protection authority about our collection and use of your personal information.
13642.title: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service

tosdr.case: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service

13643.quoteText:
We may retain information as required or permitted by applicable laws and regulations, including to honor your choices, for our billing or records purposes and to fulfill the purposes described in this Privacy Statement.
We take reasonable measures to destroy or de-identify personal information in a secure manner when it is no longer required.
13643.title: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations

tosdr.case: Some personal data may be kept after the end of the data retention period or a request for erasure

13644.quoteText:
To opt out of interest-based ads from Netflix in connection with a resettable device identifier on a mobile device, tablet, or streaming media devices, please configure the appropriate setting on your device (usually found under "privacy" or "ads" in your device's settings).
You may still see Netflix ads on your device, but they will not be tailored to your likely interests.
13644.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising

tosdr.case: You can opt out of targeted advertising

13645.quoteText: You authorize us to charge any Payment Method associated to your account in case your primary Payment Method is declined or no longer available to us for payment of your subscription fee.
13645.title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis

tosdr.case: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis

13647.quoteText: The Netflix service and any content viewed through the service are for your personal and non-commercial use only and may not be shared with individuals beyond your household.
13647.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

tosdr.case: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

13648.quoteText: To maintain control over the account and to prevent anyone from accessing the account (which would include information on viewing history for the account), the Account Owner should maintain control over the Netflix ready devices that are used to access the service and not reveal the password or details of the Payment Method associated with the account to anyone.
13648.title: The service informs users about the risk of publishing personal info online

tosdr.case: You are informed about the risk of publishing personal info online

13649.quoteText:
You are responsible for updating and maintaining the accuracy of the information you provide to us relating to your account.
We can terminate your account or place your account on hold in order to protect you, Netflix or our partners from identity theft or other fraudulent activity.
13649.title: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed

tosdr.case: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed

13650.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

14310.quoteText: Payments are non-refundable and we do not provide refunds or credits for any partial - month membership periods or unwatched Netflix content.
14310.title: The service has a no refund policy

tosdr.case: The service has a no refund policy

14311.quoteText: Whenever in the course of sharing information we transfer personal information to countries outside of the European Economic Area and other regions with comprehensive data protection laws, we will ensure that the information is transferred in accordance with this Privacy Statement and as permitted by the applicable laws on data protection.
14311.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

tosdr.case: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

20835.quoteText: You must be 18 years of age, or the age of majority in your province, territory or country, to become a member of the Netflix service.
20835.title: This service is only available to users over 18 years old

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age

20836.quoteText: Minors may only use the service under the supervision of an adult.
20836.title: Minors must have the authorization of their legal guardians to use the service

tosdr.case: Minors must have the authorization of their legal guardians to use the service

20837.quoteText: The member who created the Netflix account and whose Payment Method is charged (the "Account Owner") has access and control over the Netflix account and the Netflix ready devices that are used to access our service and is responsible for any activity that occurs through the Netflix account.
20837.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

tosdr.case: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
